data.text: Omiyo ji adekgi noweyo dwokore gi Ayub, nikech noparo ni en ngʼama kare.
To Elihu wuod Barakel ja-Buz, mane wuok e anywola mar Ram ne iye owangʼ gi Ayub nikech nopwoyore kende owuon kaka ngʼat makare, ka ok oweyo Nyasaye ema mondo opwoye.
Iye nowangʼ bende gi osiepe Ayub adek nikech negisiko mana ka gingʼado ne Ayub bura, to kata obedo nine oonge ketho.
Elihu norito mondi eka oloso gi Ayub nikech ne en ngʼama tin e diergi.
To kane oneno ka ji adekgo osewuoyo mi wechegi orumo, to mirima nomake.
Eka Elihu wuod Barakel ja-Buz nowacho kama:
Naparo e chunya ni, ‘Higa ema mondo owuo;
To ngʼeuru ni chuny manie i dhano,
Jomadongo kende ok ema nigi rieko,
“Kuom mano, awacho kama: Winjauru;
Uwinjo, ne arito mondi kane uwuoyo,
ne achikonu ita adimba kinde mane uwuoyo,
Kik uwach ni, ‘Ngʼatni riek motamo wangʼwa,
To Ayub pod ok omino koda wach,
“Jogi dhogi omoko, gionge gima ginyalo dwoko;
Gichungʼ achungʼa maonge gima giwachi,
An bende koro abiro wacho makora;
Nikech weche opongʼo chunya,
bende achalo gi chupa ma divai opongʼo iye
Nyaka awuo eka abed gi kwe;
Ok abi dewo wangʼ ngʼato
nikech ka dine bed ni alony e wuondo ji
